summary: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.
cast: Rod Taylor|Jessica Tandy|Suzanne Pleshette|Tippi Hedren|Veronica Cartwright|Ethel Griffies|Charles McGraw|Ruth McDevitt|Lonny Chapman|Joe Mantell|Doodles Weaver|Malcolm Atterbury|John McGovern|Karl Swenson|Richard Deacon|Elizabeth Wilson|Bill Quinn|Doreen Lang|Morgan Brittany|Darlene Conley|Valerie Ferdin|Betsy Hale|Alfred Hitchcock|Dal McKennon|Mike Monteleone|Renn Reed|Jeannie Russell|Roxanne Tunis|Tomm Wells|Mitch Zanich
